mapper.select: SELECT a.ip as ip , a.`master` as `master`, a.intro as intro, b.name as name, monitor.id, monitor.ip_id, monitor.client_num, monitor.commands, monitor.memory_used, monitor.redis_keys, monitor.create_time from `monitor` as `monitor` LEFT JOIN redis_ip a ON monitor.ip_id=a.id LEFT JOIN redis_group b ON a.group_id = b.id WHERE monitor.ip_id=#{ipId}
mapper.insert:

( #{item.ipId}, #{item.clientNum}, #{item.commands}, #{item.memoryUsed}, #{item.redisKeys}, #{item.createTime})
